attributes.action: Allow EU Immigrants to live and work in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been said that the large population of Immigrants, (particularly Polish), moving to the country is a problem. However, as long as they are working and paying their taxes: they're great, honest people and hard-workers. Polish Immigrants are not the Problem it's the people who are on unemployment benefits; that aren't paying taxes; already living in the country that are the problem.
